name: Ack
short_description:
The commonKADS methodology uses abstract concepts, intimately related to each other, but not that easy to follow if they are new to you.Only after deep digging and practice in the methodology one can eventually understand the concepts, their relationships and the fine tuning process that takes place during the modelling process, both in the Context and in the Concept model.
These subtle relationships have now become visible and clear through this tool, so that, in addition to easing the pain of documenting the knowledge project information, the tool allows the user to quickly understand the commonKADS methodology in a didactical, compacted way.
The advancedcommonKnowledge tool not only minimizes the risk of introducing the logical inconsistencies that one has when handling awful amounts of abstract data in iterative steps, but it also provides the possibility of blending and presenting the data as you like, dramatically improving the user’s efficiency and productivity.
